snippet: A note on the latest episode said that investigators’ pressure on the director had violated “the main principle of a documentary of high quality: the author should not be a participant of the events.”
lead_paragraph: A note on the latest episode said that investigators’ pressure on the director had violated “the main principle of a documentary of high quality: the author should not be a participant of the events.”

headline.seo: Russian Film Series Halted After Director’s Home Raided
headline.main: Russian Documentary Series Halted After Director’s Home Raided
